title: David Shulkin, "It Shouldn't Be This Hard to Serve Your Country"
description:
David Shulkin recounts his time as the Secretary of Veterans Affairs. He's interviewed by Jeremy Butler, Iraq and Afghanistan Veterans of America CEO.
